help.short: Name of the Cloud Account resource

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="schedules">
<prop type="array" name="weeklyDays">
<prop type="array" name="storagePlans" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="extendedRetention">

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the Cloud Account resource

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.schedules" options="schedules" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.storagePlans[].extendedRetention" options="extended-retention">

<prop type="array" name="schedules" arg="$resource.properties.schedules">

<prop type="array" name="storagePlans" arg="$resource.properties.storagePlans" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="extendedRetention" arg="$resource.properties.storagePlans[].extendedRetention">
